name: MeteoDisplay
short_description:
Collects meteo data from various websources and some 
local running embedded devices and displays this on any 
HTML5 capable display.

Main target is having a nice visualization 

Techniques used:
* AJAX (Javascript, HTML5)
* php
* mySQL database

Sources:
* Yahoo Weather API
* DWD (Deutscher Wetterdienst)
* Weather.com
* Meteohub (connecting to local weather station)
* Raspberry PI with 1wire temperature sensors (DS18S20)
summary: Weatherstation Display based on a tablet
